name: A Fair Game
description:
So, Have you ever wanted an unfair game thats hard to beat? Well, have i got the solution for you! Play this game to experience the life of a speedrunner! How easy and breezy the games feel! 


--current version: v1.28.21

move: arrow keys, up down, left, right

A: Z
B: X 

Thanks for playing!
It will get updates soon, i promise !
